title: Glam mac and cheese
description: A classic ‘just for the family’ dish turned completely on its head. Serve this little number in individual portions to make it worthy of any dinner-party table. I have used dolcelatte as my cheese of choice. It is softer round the edges than Stilton and incredibly moreish. It dresses up this British classic to make it a meal fit for royalty.
ingredients: 3 spring onions, trimmed and finely sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
